subject: Our Ref: WB/NF/UN/XX028 UNIT
body:
Our Ref: WB/NF/UN/XX028 UNITED NATIONS.
(WORLD BANK ASSISTED PROGRAMME)
DIRECTORATE OF INTERNATIONAL
PAYMENT AND TRANSFERS.
87 MANDELLAS DESTRICT NG LAGOS STATE  10017
WIRE TRANSFER/AUDIT UNIT
Attention: Honorable Beneficiary,
IRREVOCABLE PAYMENT ORDER VIA ATM CARD
    We have actually been authorized by the newly appointed United Nation
secretary general, and the governing body of the UNITED NATIONS monetary
unit,
to investigate the unnecessary delay on your payment, recommended and
approved in your favor. During the course of our investigation, we
discovered with dismay that your payment has been.
unnecessarily Delayed by corrupt officials of the Bank who are Trying to
divert your funds into their private accounts.
To forestall this, security for your funds was organized in the form of
your personal identification number (PIN) ATM CARD and this will enable.
only you to have direct Control.
your funds in the ATM CARD. We will monitor this payment ourselves to
avoid the hopeless situation created by the Officials of the bank.
    An irrevocable payment guarantee has been issued by the presidency,
Federal republic of Nigeria on your payment. However, we are happy to inform.
you.
you based on our recommendation /instructions, your complete contract.
Funds has been credited in your Favor through ATM CARD
`
NOTE: We are also to inform you that we initiated a New Manager (GEORGE
IBE OBASI) handling this situation for effective results and appropriate.
reimbursement funds to the various perspective's accounts.
 
Contact: Rev. George Ibe Obaise
mailgeorgeibe@mail.com
 
THANKS  
 Management

subject: Re:   Our Ref: WB/NF/UN/XX028 UNIT
body:
Hello! That sounds like an interesting opportunity. Can you provide more details about how the World Bank assisted programme works? How does the ATM card payment system function exactly?

Best wishes,
Karen
